channel.title: Comments on: SQL Saturday #119 Chicago 2012: They Did It. Again.
channel.description: A Technical Community for IT Professionals

item.title: By: Sarah Strate
item.dc:creator: Sarah Strate
item.description: Jes, I could tell you were having fun. I was going around taking some pictures, and could hear you laughing all the way down the hall - with the door shut! Way to keep things fun!
item.content:encoded: Jes, I could tell you were having fun. I was going around taking some pictures, and could hear you laughing all the way down the hall – with the door shut! Way to keep things fun!

item.title: By: Dustin Mueller
item.dc:creator: Dustin Mueller
item.content:encoded:
“What happens at #sqlkaraoke stays at #sqlkaraoke.”
– The best part of the weekend, right?

Seriously, what a great event and kudos to the event organizers, volunteers, and DeVry for putting on a terrific SQL Saturday. I’ve attended the last 2 in Chicago, and look forward to checking out all the presentations I couldn’t make it to.

item.title: By: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.dc:creator: Eli Weinstock-Herman (tarwn)
item.description: I missed the last two Chicago ones, I may have to try to make the next one, the first one was a lot of fun (even if I did have to switch to Ted sleeping hours for the weekend, aka not a whole lot :P).
item.content:encoded: I missed the last two Chicago ones, I may have to try to make the next one, the first one was a lot of fun (even if I did have to switch to Ted sleeping hours for the weekend, aka not a whole lot :P).
